trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding"></xref> or an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
It specifies the SOAP header types used to transmit error information within the SOAP header.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a URI representing the encoding style used to encode the error message for the SOAP header.
The value of this property should be set only if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.
A string containing a URI.
The default value is an empty string ("").

Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> within the XML Web service to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding"></xref> applies.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> representing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref>.
The default value is <xref href="System.String.Empty"></xref>.

Get or sets a URI representing the location of the specifications for encoding content not specifically defined by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding.Encoding"></xref> property.
This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set.
The value should only be set if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.
Returns a string representing a URI.

Gets or sets a value indicating which <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> within the XML Web service the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding"></xref> applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding"></xref> applies.

Specifies whether the header is encoded using rules specified by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Encoding"></xref> property, or is encapsulated within a concrete schema.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> values.
The default is `Default`.
